name: PostgreSQL PSC to BigQuery
description: Read from PostgreSQL (via PSC + SSL) and load into BigQuery

parameters.name: failed_table
parameters.label: BigQuery Error Table
parameters.helpText: Table to store failed rows if any (e.g., project:dataset.failed_table)

parameters.name: gcs_ssl_path
parameters.label: GCS Path to SSL certs
parameters.helpText: Path to SSL certs in GCS (e.g., gs://bucket/path/to/certs)

parameters.name: psc_host
parameters.label: PSC DNS host
parameters.helpText: The Private Service Connect DNS of Cloud SQL
